name: Neon Bubble Pop
description:
Neon Bubble Pop is an addictive, brain-training retro style puzzle game with many fun levels packed with awesome challenges, power-ups, and effects. Play today and join the bubble popping mania of Neon Bubble Pop.

Neon Bubble Pop is filled with colorful retro style neon hexagons all you need to do is to shoot and burst all the hexagons and solve the fun puzzles and challenges to level up.
Make combinations of 3 or more identically colored hexagons to pop the group and blast them away. Aim carefully to hit the target, strike and drop big groups of hexagons to unlock the booster powers. With cool new items and effects, powerful boosters and tons of puzzle levels, you just won’t put it down. Try it out today!

FEATURES OF NEON BUBBLE POP:
Play and enjoy hours of endless fun.
Precise aiming and bouncing off the walls are a must!
Swap is free, just tap on your hexagon to swipe with the next hexagon.
Addictive and super fun to play.
Multiple boosters to make the game exciting.
Over 800 Levels and many more coming soon.


BOOSTERS IN NEON BUBBLE POP:
Earn awesome power-ups by popping 15 hexagons of same color:
* Red Booster: It can blast upto 19 surrounding hexagons.
* Blue Booster: It can blast all hexagons in a row and drop all the bubble below that row.
* Yellow Booster: It can blast three small explosions, each popping upto 7 surrounding hexagons.
* Green Booster : It can blast upto 7 hexagons in vertical direction.

HOW TO PLAY NEON BUBBLE POP:
* Drag your finger to move the laser aiming and lift it to shoot hexagons.
* Match at least 3 hexagons of the same color or more to pop the group.
* Boost your experience with awesome power-ups.
* Use your moves efficiently to overcome all obstacles and complete levels.
* Pop and burst all hexagons and clear the board.
* Reach high scores by using the powerful boosters.


Liked the game? We would love to get your feedback! Let us know what we can add to make your gameplay even more enjoyable and earn your 5-star review.

Thankyou!
